text:
As part of our #blackhistorymonth events we’ve invited Dr. Easterling to answer community questions about the #COVID19 #vaccine on a PUBLIC and LIVE conversation taking place this Friday, 12:00-1:00pm p.m on #FacebookLive. Email YOUR questions to info@powerof2.nyc! 
#CovidVaccine https://t.co/olULgQnnar
